domains.name: products
domains.responsibility: Manage product records, baseline configuration, and product-level UI (product list, creation, baseline editor).

domains.name: timeline
domains.responsibility: Display and manage timeline events (interpreted events, lists, filters) used to build product narratives and release highlights.

domains.name: core
domains.responsibility: Application shell and shared app-level UX (header, global layout, toasts, theme hooks).

domains.name: connectors
domains.responsibility: Integrations and external connections UI (connection cards, add connection flows, sync/disconnect actions).

domains.name: organizations
domains.responsibility: Organization management and switching (org switcher, org lists, org-related settings links).

domains.name: auth
domains.responsibility: Authentication flows and forms (signin, signup, password reset UI and validation).

domains.name: shared
domains.responsibility: Reusable UI primitives and layout utilities used across settings and domains (settings layout, utility exports).

errors.error: Structure scout did not return output
Glossary scout did not return output

features.description: List, create, and manage product records from the product dashboard; includes baseline configuration entry points.

evidence.excerpt: Exports product list and routing for product CRUD flows (ProductsList, ProductCreate routes).
BaselineEditor component: UI for configuring product baseline settings and saving baseline configuration.

features.name: Product list & creation

features.description: Display and manage timeline events with interpreted event items, lists and filters to build product narratives and release highlights.

evidence.excerpt: TimelineList component: renders event rows, supports filtering and event grouping for product narratives.
Timeline domain index: registers timeline routes and exposes timeline-related hooks and helpers.

features.name: Timeline events list & filters

features.description: Global app shell providing header, layout, theming hooks and global UX primitives (toasts, navigation).

evidence.excerpt: AppShell component: defines top-level layout, header, navigation slot and global state plumbing.
Core domain index: wires core providers and exports global hooks (theme, toasts) used across the app.

features.name: Application shell & global layout

features.description: UI for managing integrations: connection cards, add-connection flows, sync and disconnect actions.

evidence.excerpt: ConnectionCard: displays connector status, last sync, and actions (sync, disconnect, settings).
Connectors domain index: routes and helpers for connector onboarding and management flows.

features.name: Connectors - connection management

features.description: Organization picker and related org-level links (switcher UI, org list and settings shortcuts).

evidence.excerpt: OrgSwitcher component: select active organization, shows org list and quick links to org settings.
Organizations index: exposes organization services and routes for organization settings.

features.name: Organization switcher & org management

features.description: User authentication forms and flows including signin, signup and validation UI for account access.

evidence.excerpt: SigninForm: username/email and password input, validation, submit handling and error messages.
SignupForm: account creation UI, input validation, and onboarding hooks.

features.name: Authentication flows (sign in / sign up)

features.description: Reusable settings layout, shared components and utilities used across domain settings pages and admin flows.

evidence.excerpt: SettingsLayout: reusable page scaffold for settings pages with nav and content areas.
Shared domain index: exports shared UI primitives and utilities used across multiple domains.

features.name: Shared settings layout & UI primitives
